description: Ask for directions to this restaurant when you make your booking, as you’ll need to leave your vehicle in a private car park at the entrance to the village and then make your way uphill on foot. ...
facilitiesServices: Air conditioning, Car park, Garden or park, Great view, Interesting wine list, Terrace
creditCards: American Express credit card, Credit card / Debit card accepted, Diners Club credit card, Mastercard credit card, Visa credit card
